thought.text: The import issue is preventing me from testing the full functionality. However, I can see from the earlier tests that the URL preparation is working correctly. Let me try to run the original reproduction case by creating a minimal test that doesn't trigger the import issues:

task_list.title: Phase 2: RUNNING - Set up and run tests
Phase 3: EXPLORATION - Find related files
task_list.notes: Found the issue in models.py line 84, _encode_params method

task_list.title: Phase 4: TEST CREATION - Create reproduction script
Phase 5: FIX ANALYSIS - Analyze the problem and solution
task_list.notes: Need to distinguish URL params vs body data handling

task_list.title: Phase 6: FIX IMPLEMENTATION - Implement the fix
task_list.notes: Reverted _encode_params and added to_native_string for URL params

function.arguments: {"command": "plan", "security_risk": "LOW", "task_list": [{"title": "Phase 1: READING - Understand the problem", "status": "done"}, {"title": "Phase 2: RUNNING - Set up and run tests", "status": "done", "notes": "Found version 2.9.0, fixed compatibility issues"}, {"title": "Phase 3: EXPLORATION - Find related files", "status": "done", "notes": "Found the issue in models.py line 84, _encode_params method"}, {"title": "Phase 4: TEST CREATION - Create reproduction script", "status": "done", "notes": "Successfully reproduced the UnicodeDecodeError"}, {"title": "Phase 5: FIX ANALYSIS - Analyze the problem and solution", "status": "done", "notes": "Need to distinguish URL params vs body data handling"}, {"title": "Phase 6: FIX IMPLEMENTATION - Implement the fix", "status": "done", "notes": "Reverted _encode_params and added to_native_string for URL params"}, {"title": "Phase 7: VERIFICATION - Test the implementation", "status": "in_progress"}, {"title": "Phase 8: FINAL REVIEW - Comprehensive testing", "status": "todo"}]}
function.name: task_tracker
